QuestData.Title: [DNT] A Little Pruning
QuestData.Description:
Greetings, mortal. I have need of your assistance.
The gardens have fallen into disrepair during the dragonflights' long absence. Many of its plants have become... unruly.
I must tend to the seedlings, and am thus preoccupied. Please dispatch the more hostile vegetation, and you will be rewarded accordingly.
